publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-757 Donald Gorrie: Rental Costs for the Assembly Hallâ€”That the Parliament believes that, in order to provide a complete picture of the transactions relating to the new Parliament building, the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SPCB) should agree with the Church of Scotland to remove the confidentiality clause in the agreement for the Parliament to rent the Assembly Hall and make public the details of the financial arrangements made both by the Scottish Office, before the Parliament existed, and by the SPCB, for the extensions of the lease.
S2M-757 Rental Costs for the Assembly Hall (lodged on 5 January 2004) Iain Smith*, Alex Neil*, Patrick Harvie*, Mike Rumbles*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-757 Rental Costs for the Assembly Hall (lodged on 5 January 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Mike Pringle*, Christine Grahame*, John Swinburne*
S2M-757 Rental Costs for the Assembly Hall (lodged on 5 January 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-757 Donald Gorrie: Rental Costs for the Assembly Hall-That the Parliament believes that, in order to provide a complete picture of the transactions relating to the new Parliament building, the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SPCB) should agree with the Church of Scotland to remove the confidentiality clause in the agreement for the Parliament to rent the Assembly Hall and make public the details of the financial arrangements made both by the Scottish Office, before the Parliament existed, and by the SPCB, for the extensions of the lease. Supported by: Iain Smith, Alex Neil, Patrick Harvie, Mike Rumbles, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Carolyn Leckie, Nora Radcliffe, Mike Pringle, Christine Grahame, John Swinburne, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Frances Curran*
S2M-757 Rental Costs for the Assembly Hall (lodged on 5 January 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-757 Rental Costs for the Assembly Hall (lodged on 5 January 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
